name: Rescue bomber
description:
Experience upgraded version of bomberman!

Story:
The evil Lord of Skull kidnapped all your fellows form the village and you have to rescue them my friend.
Using bombs fight freedom for one you love. You are the hope, you are the rescue bomber!

Features:
-4 game modes with bosses included
-60 levels to beat in story mode
-Story mode local cooperation with another player
-Simple character upgrade system
-Local VS mode up to 4 people with computer or other players
-Challenging difficulty, specifically on higher levels
-Character painting system
